description: An eye property set stored as either an accessor or a texture, referenced via a glTF id.

type.description: Specifies whether the eye properties are stored in an accessor or a texture.

value.description: The id of the accessor or texture storing the eye properties.

dataStride.description: It may be necessary to store custom data that does not fit the glTF types of SCALAR, VEC2/3/4 or MAT2/3/4, for instance, when a time-series is required or polygons defined by an arbitrarily long list of VEC2s. This allows that data to be specified alongside regular eye properties.
